section.heading: Short forms.
section.text: The following short form certificates of notarial acts shall be sufficient for the purposes indicated, if completed with the information required by § 42-147(a).

para.text: For an acknowledgment in an individual capacity:
This instrument was acknowledged before me on (date) by (name(s) of person(s)).
This instrument was acknowledged before me on (date) by (name(s) of person(s)) as (type of authority, e.g., officer, trustee, etc.) of (name of party on behalf of whom instrument was executed).

para.afterText: For an acknowledgment in a representative capacity:
For a verification upon oath or affirmation:
Signed and sworn to (or affirmed) before me on (date) by (name(s) of person(s) making statement).

para.text: For witnessing or attesting a signature:
Signed or attested before me on (date) by (name(s) of person(s)).

annoGroup.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 2(b) of Uniform Law on Notarial Acts Temporary Amendment Act of 1991 (D.C. Law 9-9, July 13, 1991, law notification 38 DCR 4812).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Application of Law 9-52: Section 3 of D.C. Law 9-52 provided that the act shall apply as of March 6, 1991.
Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 8 of the Uniform Law on Notarial Acts.
